title: As a BOC user I want my Approvals clipboard to display the transaction date of a transaction, not the submitted date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing the Approvals clipboard
custom_expected:
THEN BOC users want the "Date" column in the Approvals widget to be the transaction date, and not the submission date of items submitted to the BOC for approval. 
AND A secondary sort should be applied on when the transaction was submitted.
AND The most recent items should appear on top.

title: As a Club user I want an action item to be created for a player that has been Designated for Assignment for 3 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a Designated for Assignment tx with a placement date of 3 or more days ago
custom_steps: WHEN user runs the Nightly Notification batch
custom_expected:
THEN On the 3rd Day after the "Placement Date" of a Designate for Release or Assignment, if a player still has a MJ Roster Status of "Designated for Assignment", and no pending MJ Roster status, then generate an action item. 
AND Action item should disappear when player's pending / current roster status is no longer DFA.

*Example if April 11th is the placement date, then on April 14th action item sent.

title: As a BOC user I want to be warned on approval of a Free Agency transaction to have LRD review the tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user creates an Elect Free Agency tx under article XX(D) or XIX(A)
AND it is during the MJ Lg Season
custom_expected:
THEN the BOC user approver a message that says "Before approving this transaction, contact the LRD"
AND this message should be overrideable

title: As a user I want the Roster Counts widget to be more interactive - Part 1
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Roster Counts widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on an affiliate name
custom_expected: THEN widget should bounce the user to the appropriate widget and auto-filter the widget to that affiliate.
